content: Donglai Wei Donglai Wei Assistant Professor of Computer Science Boston College Office: 245 Beacon St., Rm 528F Email: donglai.wei [AT] bc.edu Github / Google Scholar / Hugging Face My group advances AI4Neuroscience by developing foundation models for large-scale biomedical image analysis and AI-augmented science discovery. Our research is generously supported by NSF CAREER Award, NIH R01, and Gates Foundation. I spent memorable postdoc years at Harvard University, working with Hanspeter Pfister and Jeff Lichtman. I was fortunate to be advised by William Freeman during my Ph.D. at MIT CSAIL. As an undergraduate in Mathematics at Brown University (after transferring from Tsinghua University), I had the privilege to work under Charles Lawrence, Erik Sudderth, Stuart Geman, and See-Chen Ying. Now Looking For: phDs (directly apply here), postdocs, visiting scholars and research interns.
